alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Choctaw; Clay; Grenada; Lowndes; Montgomery; Oktibbeha; Webster (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 22 at 3:13PM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 10 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills briefly below 10 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 5 to 10 below zero. Northwest winds up to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph are possible in the warning area. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central and northeast Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 9 PM this evening to noon CST Friday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from noon Friday to 10 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous low wind chills are likely to result in frostbite in a short period of time or hypothermia with prolonged exposure if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Choctaw; Clay; Grenada; Lowndes; Montgomery; Oktibbeha; Webster
